definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
echelon (military)/(of an organisation) group of persons of one level or grade
flight of steps/(fig.) a means of advancement/stepping stone
stairway to heaven/high mountain road/tall ladder on a building or other large structure/space elevator
gangway/ramp (to board a ship or plane)

sentences.english: Yoshio Aoki is a director of the Japan Space Elevator Association.
sentences.chinese: 青木芳雄是日本太空梯協會主任。

sentences.english: Russia has dug itself in, basically, into Abkhazia and South Ossetia.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯基本上已經在阿布哈茲和南奧賽梯站住了腳。

sentences.english: The spiral section was part of the flight leading from the second to the third levels of the tower.
sentences.chinese: 這段螺旋梯屬於艾菲爾鐵塔第二層通往第三層的部份。

sentences.english: Supporting platform for scale mounted on the machine with vertical ladder.
sentences.chinese: 對於用直立梯固定在機器上的檯秤的支撐平臺。

sentences.english: Papering the ceiling proved next to impossible without a ladder.
sentences.chinese: 用紙糊天花板沒有梯子兒乎是不可能的。

sentences.english: Why is common herd's grass also called timothy grass?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼常見的貓尾草也叫梯牧草？

sentences.english: Completing the mountain trails project of "Cultivating Cave" with 999 steps in general.
sentences.chinese: 完成了“修真古洞”登山步道工程，總檯階999梯。

sentences.english: I think they should make some stiles for people to cross the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他們應該建些梯磴好讓人們跨過牆去。

sentences.english: Controls for unlocking stairway doors simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 同時打開梯道門的控制器。

sentences.english: Dust the chair before you sit down.
sentences.chinese: 坐之前你要撣掉梯凳子上的灰塵。

sentences.english: Alfalfa and timothy hay are the main forages exported from Canada.
sentences.chinese: 紫花苜蓿和梯牧草是加拿大出口的主要牧草。

sentences.english: Reaches the new village ladder young range standard for Jinjiang west the brook origin place.
sentences.chinese: 達新村梯仔嶺格爲晉江西溪發源地。

sentences.english: Are fire escapes available for buildings more than one story high?
sentences.chinese: 織夢好，好織夢廠內超過一層高的大廈有防火梯嗎？

sentences.english: The metal ladder has the diaphragm with padlock device and alarm nameplate .
sentences.chinese: 金屬梯設置帶掛鎖設施和警告銘牌的隔板。

definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
top floor/attic/loft/garret/penthouse/(flat) rooftop (often used as an outdoor living area etc)
plank walkway constructed on the face of a cliff/(archaic) elevated passageway connecting the upper levels of adjacent towers
